title: 4MOST 2011-12
findingsText:
We have shown:
1) that the scientific objectives of 4MOST (dark matter in our Milky Way galaxy, the structure and history of the
Milky Way; the nature of cosmic acceleration, the growth of structure and the 
formation and evolution of super-massive black holes) are a high priority for European astronomers.
2) that the proposal to convert the VISTA telescope into a powerful wide field spectroscopic survey facility, which will carry out major long-term surveys, is technically feasible and can be done within an affordable budget and within an acceptable timescale. Our findings will be used to take the project forwards to completion. Other
